issue.title: [R] Enable snappy+lz4 by default
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14594](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14594). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14594?focusedCommentId=17440826) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
This is the last blocker for 6.0.1 RC1.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14594?focusedCommentId=17440853) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
I just removed the 6.0.1 label—it would be fantastic to include—but I haven't yet figured out how to get it working + compatible with our supported platforms. Please go on with 6.0.1 and if this has to wait until 7.0.0 that's ok

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14594?focusedCommentId=17441996) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11614
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11614>
